steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"cuhe9","text":"Add   Recovery Agent to each sample at room temperature. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"69li8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"57e0i","text":"DO NOT pipette mix or vortex the biphasic mixture.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":50}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"125","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"apsv1","text":"Firmly secure the cap on the tube strip, ensuring that no liquid is trapped between the cap and the tube rim. Mix by inverting the capped tube strip 5x.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4bibf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1fbvh","text":"DO NOT invert without firmly securing the caps.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":47}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bdd9a","text":"Wait 2 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bh14f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"43noh","text":"The resulting biphasic mixture contains Recovery Agent/Partitioning Oil (pink) and aqueous phase (translucent/opaque). A smaller aqueous phase volume indicates a clog during GEM generation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":189}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2eo5m","text":"Centrifuge briefly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"769ci","text":"Slowly remove and discard   Recovery Agent/Partitioning Oil (pink) from the bottom of the tube. DO NOT aspirate any aqueous sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":96,"length":35}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":26,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"125","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6444j","text":"Proceed directly to Pre-Amplification PCR. No cleanup step is required.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"anmrl","text":"Prepare Pre-Amplification Mix on ice. Vortex and centrifuge briefly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aonb4","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"d7iq1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"A_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"A_4":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"B_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"B_4":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"C_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"C_4":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"D_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"D_4":{"className":"_dt-bold"}},"colTitles":["","","",""],"colWidths":["209",100,100,100],"data":[["Pre-Amp Mix (add reagents in order listed)","PN","1X (µl)","4X + 10% (µl)"],["Amp Mix","2000103","25.0","110.0"],["Pre-Amp Primers B","2000529","10.0","44.0"],["Total","","35.0","154.00"]],"guid":"87DC8725EFBA4B6AAEC18B53B08E73FE","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Pre-Amp Mix (add reagents in order listed)","PN","1X (µl)","4X + 10% (µl)"],["Amp Mix","2000103","25.0","110.0"],["Pre-Amp Primers B","2000529","10.0","44.0"],["Total","","35.0","154.00"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"kog9","text":"Add   Pre-Amplification Mix to aqueous sample from step 6.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2dbse","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"35","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"as3ok","text":"Cap firmly and invert 8x to mix. Centrifuge briefly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a198n","text":"Incubate in a thermal cycler with the following protocol:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3rsin","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"444a2","text":"Store at 4°C for up to 72 h or −20°C for ≤1 week, or proceed to the next step.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":78},{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":78}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["","",""],"colWidths":[100,"130","130"],"data":[["Step","Temperature","Time (hh:mm:ss)"],["1","98C","00:03:00"],["2","98C","00:00:15"],["3","63C","00:00:20"],["4","72C","00:01:00"],["5","Go to Step 2, 7x (total 8 cycles)",""],["6","72C","00:01:00"],["7","4C","Hold"]],"guid":"9449A092B2D249BC8033B57B718732D4","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3fh2c","text":"Saved as 'pre-amp' under Fixed RNA folder.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"aen3e","text":"Lid Temperature: 105C","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"648gb","text":"Reaction Volume: 100µl","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"ef04r","text":"Run Time: ~30-45 min","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":{"B_6":[2,1]},"printData":[["Step","Temperature","Time (hh:mm:ss)"],["1","98C","00:03:00"],["2","98C","00:00:15"],["3","63C","00:00:20"],["4","72C","00:01:00"],["5","Go to Step 2, 7x (total 8 cycles)",""],["6","72C","00:01:00"],["7","4C","Hold"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

Vortex and centrifuge briefly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9032i","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7np99","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"A_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"A_5":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"B_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"B_5":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"C_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"C_5":{"className":"_dt-bold"}},"colTitles":["","",""],"colWidths":["200",100,100],"data":[["Elution Solution (add reagents in order listed)","PN","1000µl"],["Buffer EB","","980"],["10% Tween 20","","10"],["Reducing Agent B","2000087","10"],["Total","","1000"]],"guid":"4906EECCDD6A49239411FD8B28D76A8D","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Elution Solution (add reagents in order listed)","PN","1000µl"],["Buffer EB","","980"],["10% Tween 20","","10"],["Reducing Agent B","2000087","10"],["Total","","1000"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3hdl","text":"Centrifuge the sample (PCR product) for   sec in a microcentrifuge and transfer   of the upper layer to a new tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":40,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":80,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ckb9h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7mc3q","text":"Presence of a cloudy precipitate at the interface between phases is normal. {"blocks":[{"key":"2b2a8","text":"Vortex to resuspend the SPRIselect reagent. Add   SPRIselect reagent (1.8X) to each sample and pipette mix 15x (pipette set to 180 μl).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":50,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":48,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"126","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b6efv","text":"Place on the magnet (high position) until the solution clears.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8t68","text":"Remove the supernatant. DO NOT discard any beads.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":24,"length":25},{"style":"bold","offset":24,"length":25}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fdnc6","text":"With the tube still in the magnet, add   80% ethanol to the pellet. Wait   sec.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":41,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":39,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":73,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":30,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"11tn3","text":"Remove the ethanol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"681n4","text":"Repeat steps 18 and 18.1 for a total of 2 washes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"faopm","text":"Centrifuge briefly and place on the magnet (low position).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"168uj","text":"Remove any remaining ethanol. DO NOT let the sample dry to ensure maximum elution efficiency.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":30,"length":63},{"style":"italic","offset":30,"length":63}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c1hi1","text":"Remove from the magnet. Add   Elution Solution (from step 12). Wait   min before resuspending. Pipette mix 15x.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":30,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":28,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":68,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6p8hu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"101","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":60,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7jlgo","text":"Incubate   min at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":18,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bapgr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"at1nb","text":"Place the tube strip on the magnet (high position) until the solution clears.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
